subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet edged Fernando Verdasco, 6-3, 5-7, 7-6 (5), in the final of the Nice Open in France for his first title since 2007.
snippet: Richard Gasquet edged Fernando Verdasco, 6-3, 5-7, 7-6 (5), in the final of the Nice Open in France for his first title since 2007.
